title: Bajaj Auto total vehicle sales grow 8 percent in August
description: Total domestic sales rose 49 per cent to 2,56,755 units in the month under review, from 1,72,595 units in August 2021. The two-wheeler exports volume fell 28 per cent to 1,44,840 units in August this year, from 2,00,675 units in the year-ago period, the company said in a statement.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
